items.title: Opioid-induced Constipation
items.description: OIC is a common, yet frequently under-recognised, poorly managed complication of opioid therapy.ยน

accordion.medicalEducation: Here you will find educational resources focused on the diagnosis and treatment of OIC.
accordion.medicalResources: Here you will find a collection of published data, clinical expertise and guidance for the various treatment options available for OIC.
accordion.diseasePages: Here you will find expert medical resources delving into the pathology and epidemiology of OIC as well as its impact on patient quality of life.

items.title: Breakthrough Cancer Pain
items.description: Transient exacerbations of pain, known as BtCP, are a common problem in cancer patients, as a direct or indirect result of the cancer itself, or the cancer treatment.2

items.title: Strain Muscle
items.description: A muscle strain happens when fibers in a muscle are overstretched or torn. If often occurs during sudden movements, like sprinting or jumping.
